title: Open Channel Management - OpenChannelSystem
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic water system made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems). This entity represents either a system composed of different components (e.g., channels, junctions, cross-sections etc) or just a component (e.g., a SluiceGate)

description.description: Property. A free text description for the system

isComposedOf.description: Relationship. Reference to the ID of an entity of type Channel, cross-section, Junction, Regulation structure, SluiceGate, Spillway.

hasSubSystem.description: Relationship. Reference to the ID of an Open Channel sub-system, considered as a system - an entity of type OpenChannelSystem.

mostUpstreamPoint.description: Relationship. Reference to the id of the most upstream point of the system

mostDownstreamPoint.description: Relationship. Reference to the id of the most downstream point of the system
